statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-8 \, x^{3} - 15 \, x^{2} + x - 4 , -3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 4 , 2 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x - 4 , 3 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} + 4 , -7 \, x^{3} - 15 \, x^{2} - x - 16\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
